mapper.select: select * from main_banner where banner_type = 'top-text' and is_open = 'Y' and status = 'A' and start_at <= (now() + interval 9 hour) and end_at >= (now() + interval 9 hour) order by start_at, updated_at limit 3;

select mb.* -- , s3.id as s3id, s3.cdn_url from main_banner mb -- join s3file_data s3fd on mb.id = s3fd.row_id and s3fd.group_name = 'main_banner' -- join s3file s3 on s3fd.s3file_id = s3.id where banner_type = 'middle-rolling' and mb.status = 'A' and mb.start_at <= now() and mb.end_at >= now() order by mb.sort desc;

SELECT id, title, content, publish_at, status, created_at, updated_at , CASE when created_at >= DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -7 DAY) then 'Y' else 'N' end as is_new FROM content_newsletter WHERE status = 'A' ORDER BY publish_at desc, created_at desc

SELECT id, title, content, publish_at, status, created_at, updated_at , CASE when created_at >= DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -7 DAY) then 'Y' else 'N' end as is_new FROM content_newsletter WHERE status = 'A' and id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO newsletter_subscriber ( name , email , lang , is_subscribe ) VALUES ( #{name} , #{email} , #{lang} , 'Y' )
INSERT INTO newsletter_subscribe_history ( newsletter_subscriber_id , is_subscribe ) VALUES ( #{newsletter_id} , 'Y' )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM newsletter_subscriber where name = #{name} and email = #{email} limit 1
SELECT * FROM main_popup WHERE popup_type = 'bottom-right' and status = 'A' and start_at <= (now() + interval 9 hour) and end_at >= (now() + interval 9 hour) ORDER BY sort DESC LIMIT 1
select * from main_banner where banner_type = 'main-rolling' and status = 'A' and start_at <= now() and end_at >= now() order by sort;

SELECT id, content_type, sale_no, start_at, end_at, read_count, content, sort, file_status, created_at, updated_at FROM content_brochure cb WHERE status = 'A' AND file_status = 'before' AND (now() + interval 9 hour) between start_at and end_at AND sale_no = #{sale_no} ORDER BY sort
